examples.text: <w>Перенасытив</w> рынок своей продукцией, крупный производитель был вынужден снизить цены для привлечения новых покупателей.

target_lang_translations.en: <w>Having oversaturated</w> the market with its products, the large manufacturer was forced to lower prices to attract new buyers.

examples.text: Случайно <w>перенасытив</w> раствор химическим реагентом, лаборант испортил важный эксперимент и был вынужден начать всё заново.

target_lang_translations.en: Having accidentally <w>oversaturated</w> the solution with a chemical reagent, the lab technician ruined an important experiment and was forced to start all over again.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past adverbial participle of the verb 'to oversaturate', indicating that the action of filling or supplying something to excess was completed before the main action.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: often used in economic contexts (e.g., market)
